definition: simultaneous interpretation (abbr. for 同聲傳譯|同声传译[tong2 sheng1 chuan2 yi4])
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Nominalization is among the language phenomena that interpreters often find difficult to deal with.
sentences.chinese: 名詞化結構是造成英漢同傳困難的常見誘發因素之一。
